column1: The Pit Room////But that elote though.... I've never had elote as good in my life. I love that it comes in a cup
column2: filled to the brim with corn
column4: and hot sauce. I've only ever had it on the cob. All things are not created equal. The coleslaw was crisp and refreshing
column5: especially after the heaviness of the meat and the elote.
